backend/main.mo: Defines all backend game types and state, initializes dialogue, activities, moments, and provides entry points for starting or continuing a game.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, associated files, components, and tests for reliability, error boundaries, asset handling, and diagnostics.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across UI, game systems, scenes, controls, and data.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, theming, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling startup, navigation, backend game launches, error states, and diagnostics.
Defines the Activity interface and a list of activities with trust effects and optional moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Zustand-powered audio manager handling volume, mute state, and background music playback with persistence.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: 3D Puro character model with idle animation, hover effects, and click-to-open-dialogue interaction.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Touch-based joystick and look controls for mobile devices, updating player movement and camera look.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard, joystick, and look input into normalized movement and look vectors, respecting pause state.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: List of customizable items with descriptions and valid placement locations.
Dialogue tree defining nodes, choices, trust effects, and optional trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game container that initializes the game, renders the 3D scene, HUD, menus, and handles pause state and background music.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates letter responses based on keyword matching using friendly, curious, or encouraging templates.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: A drag-and-drop style minigame where players sort shuffled books into categories, adjusting trust based on correctness.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: A slideshow-style drawing viewer where players look through Puro's drawings, gaining trust as they view each one.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed guessing minigame where players try to find Puro's hiding spot, with trust changes based on speed and accuracy.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: A launcher component that shows a menu and loads one of several minigames based on player selection.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a narrative moment with title, scene text, and a close button in a modal-style card.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines the Moment interface and exports a list of narrative moments with trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Renders the 3D library environment, handling player movement, camera control, textures, and scene objects.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Zustand store managing trust, dialogue, activities, customization, letters, endings, and UI panel visibility with persistent state and actions.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines ending data and selects an ending based on trust level thresholds.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the final ending scene based on trust level, unlocks the ending, and provides options to start a new game or return to title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Shows selectable activities that modify trust, mark completion, unlock moments, and close the menu.
Allows placing discovered customization items in the library and displays placed and available items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Renders dialogue nodes with choices that adjust trust and navigate the dialogue tree.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Supports writing letters, auto-generating responses, and viewing inbox messages.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays a list of unlockable story moments and lets the user play unlocked ones via MomentPlayer.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Provides a pause overlay with resume, navigation shortcuts, settings access, and progress reset options.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Renders audio settings including mute and volume controls with a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Shows the current trust level with a label, color indicator, and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider with login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with react-query hooks for game state, actions, and progress updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm-themed light/dark color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Runs one‑time app startup, checking storage availability and preloading key images, with reset support for testing.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays the game's credits and about info with a themed background and a button to return to the title screen.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Shows user‑friendly and optional technical details when the game fails to launch, with a button to return to the title.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime rendering errors and presents a recovery screen with optional stack details.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the main title menu with New Game, Continue, Settings, and Credits options, supporting a launching state.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation of the frontend startup flow including asset preloading, storage checks, and runStartup API usage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and content paths for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features for the game.
